text:
Scaffolding complete. Here's what was created in `/Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/web/`:

**Files created (10 total):**
- `web/package.json` — Vite + React 19 + Tailwind v4 + Radix UI + lucide-react + vite-plugin-singlefile
- `web/vite.config.ts` — React plugin, Tailwind plugin, singlefile plugin, `@` alias, proxy to `:3333`
- `web/tsconfig.json` — Strict TS config with `@/*` path alias
- `web/tsconfig.app.json` — Extends base, relaxes unused locals/params
- `web/index.html` — Vite entry point (old one backed up as `index.html.bak`)
- `web/src/main.tsx` — React root mount
- `web/src/globals.css` — Tailwind import + honey theme CSS variables (dark/light)
- `web/src/App.tsx` — Placeholder with sidebar + main area layout
- `web/src/lib/utils.ts` — `cn()` helper (clsx + tailwind-merge)
- `web/src/vite-env.d.ts` — Vite type reference

**Empty directories created:**
- `web/src/components/ui/`
- `web/src/hooks/`
- `web/src/types/`
- `web/src/data/`

No npm commands were run. Ready for `npm install` when needed.

Both edits completed:

1. `src/webui/mod.rs:23` — updated `include_str!` path to `../../web/dist/index.html`
2. `.gitignore` — appended WebUI build artifact rules (`web/node_modules/`, `web/dist/*`, `!web/dist/index.html`)

Done. Created both files:

- `/Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/web/src/types/api.ts` — 5 interfaces: `DroneInfo`, `TaskInfo`, `MemberInfo`, `MessageInfo`, `CostInfo`
- `/Users/fr162241/Projects/hive/web/src/data/mock.ts` — `MOCK_DRONES` (3 drones: auth-service, frontend-revamp, db-migration) and `MOCK_LOGS` (keyed by drone name)

The mock data import uses the `@/types/api` path alias. All types match the spec exactly.
summary: Created types and mock data files

text:
Done. Created all three React hooks in `web/src/hooks/`:

1. **use-drones.ts** — `useDrones()` hook with SSE connection to `/api/events`, automatic retry on disconnect, and mock data fallback when no backend is available. Returns `{ drones, connectionStatus }`.

2. **use-logs.ts** — `useLogs(droneName, isMock)` hook with SSE streaming from `/api/logs/:name`, 500-line buffer cap, and mock mode that trickles lines every 1.5s. Returns `{ logs }`.

3. **use-theme.ts** — `useTheme()` hook with dark/light toggle, localStorage persistence under `hive-theme` key, and system preference detection. Returns `{ theme, toggleTheme }`.
summary: Created all 3 React hooks in web/src/hooks/

text:
All shadcn/ui components created successfully:

**Config:**
- `web/components.json` — shadcn config (new-york style, CSS variables)

**7 UI primitives in `web/src/components/ui/`:**
1. `button.tsx` — 6 variants (default, destructive, outline, secondary, ghost, link) + 4 sizes
2. `badge.tsx` — 6 variants including success/warning for status indicators
3. `card.tsx` — Card + Header/Title/Description/Content/Footer
4. `progress.tsx` — Progress bar with radix-ui primitive
5. `scroll-area.tsx` — ScrollArea + ScrollBar (vertical/horizontal)
6. `separator.tsx` — Separator (horizontal/vertical)
7. `avatar.tsx` — Avatar + Image + Fallback

All components use honey theme CSS variables and import `cn` from `@/lib/utils`.

All 7 utility UI component files created and passing TypeScript checks:

1. `web/src/components/constants.ts` - Shared AGENT_COLORS array and helper functions (agentColor, agentInitials, agentColorIndex, fmtCost, fmtTokens, shortModel)
2. `web/src/components/theme-toggle.tsx` - ThemeToggle component
3. `web/src/components/cost-card.tsx` - CostCard component
4. `web/src/components/task-list.tsx` - TaskList component
5. `web/src/components/team-bar.tsx` - TeamBar component
6. `web/src/components/chat-messages.tsx` - ChatMessages component
7. `web/src/components/log-viewer.tsx` - LogViewer component

No TypeScript errors in any of the new files (pre-existing App.tsx JSX runtime errors are unrelated).
summary: All 7 utility UI components created successfully
